pages.text: $(li)Greatly improved the speed of dungeon building!$(li)Almost completely eliminated the lag spike that occurs when a new dungeon is built.$(li)Fixed a major oversight involving breaking the Keyhole block while a build is in progress.

$(li)Portals will once again refuse to open if they lead to a void.$(li)Increased the default build speed from 2 ticks skipped per chunk, to 5.$(li)Therefore, check your server config if you're still experiencing lag.$(li)Portals will now open faster if the dungeon is already built.
